title: Constructing an Astronomical Image
content: Move the slider next to the g filter back to its original location (so that the image looked as it did before you moved it). Now move the slider next to the r filter all the way to the left.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: What happens to the appearance of the image?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Explain why the appearance of the image changed in the way it did.
